pages.text: $(italic)In your search for the perfect tool, you've found that the Enchanting Table often doesn't do your bidding. Using this highly modified Enchanting Table should resolve most of the issue you had with your original one.$()$(br2)It allows you to:$(li)$(l:enchanting/creating_enchanted_books)create new Enchanted Books$(/l)$(li)$(l:enchanting/upgrading_enchanted_books)upgrade them$(/l)$(li)$(l:enchanting/enchanting_items)enchant items without consuming Enchanted Books$(/l)
